Text:
Hey, great work uploading all the tools for this device man! This really helps anyone who just purchased one of these a great deal, especially since those chinese servers are slow as hell.

It took me all night to download the latest image, mele_20120503_v1.6.img, and I was going to create a torrent for it, but seeing as you have a great collection of this stuff already I was wondering if perhaps you wanted to do the honors?

I've uploaded it to my website, you can download it using this link:
http://dave.rafe.name/mele_20120503_v1.6.img
